Notes.Text:
This update for lasso fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-46404: specially crafted SAML response can lead to a denial of service (bsc#1253092).
- CVE-2025-46705: specially crafted SAML assertion response can lead to a denial of service (bsc#1253093).
- CVE-2025-47151: type confusion vulnerability exists in the lasso_node_impl_init_from_xml functionality can lead to
  an arbitrary code execution (bsc#1253095).
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0

Vulnerabilities.Description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the lasso_provider_verify_saml_signature functionality of Entr'ouvert Lasso 2.5.1. A specially crafted SAML response can lead to a denial of service. An attacker can send a malformed SAML response to trigger this vulnerability.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso-devel-2.8.2-160000.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso3-2.8.2-160000.3.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the g_assert_not_reached functionality of Entr'ouvert Lasso 2.5.1 and 2.8.2. A specially crafted SAML assertion response can lead to a denial of service. An attacker can send a malformed SAML response to trigger this vulnerability.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso-devel-2.8.2-160000.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso3-2.8.2-160000.3.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: A type confusion vulnerability exists in the lasso_node_impl_init_from_xml functionality of Entr'ouvert Lasso 2.5.1 and 2.8.2. A specially crafted SAML response can lead to an arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malformed SAML response to trigger this vulnerability.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso-devel-2.8.2-160000.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 16.0:liblasso3-2.8.2-160000.3.1
